resources.string: No starred items found! Please go back and select \"Play all lessons\" in order to mark lessons as starred.

No Assimil Audio Files have been found on your device. If the lessons show up in the \"Google Play Music\" app, you might be learning a language that is not yet supported by Selma. Please contact the author, who will be glad to be extend this free app with a little help (answering some questions) from you.
You can click on the stars to mark the lessons that you are currently focusing on.
Click here to choose if you want to see all lessons or only the ones you starred.

Use these buttons for playback:

Left button changes repeat mode (long press to see all options).

Use the second button to start or pause playback.

Press the third button to jump to next text (only during playback).

Last button jumps to next lesson (only during playback).
Here the current lesson and text is shown. Click anytime to jump to the current lesson.
